subject: 蓝精灵们在洞穴中发现宝物
detail: Animated fantasy style, blue Smurfs discovering a glowing gemstone inside a mystical cave, first gathered curiously around the radiant gem, then weaving glowing vines around it, next the gem pulsing with increasing light, finally erupting in a dazzling, ethereal glow that illuminates the surrounding crystal clusters and bioluminescent vines; dim ambient cave lighting with dynamic gemlight reflections, soft volumetric glow, intricate magical details; Dolly in smoothly toward the gem as it intensifies; Background sound: delicate crystalline chimes and resonant gem hum. Voiceover says in Chinese "他们发现了传说中的发光宝石"
image_detail: (动画风格) 小精灵们在洞穴中发现一颗发光的宝石，周围有发光的藤蔓和水晶簇
narration: 他们发现了传说中的发光宝石
